website_summaries.verdict: This model offers surprising power and a wide array of one-touch and defrost settings in a compact unit designed to save lots of counter space.
pros: 1100 watts packs a lot of punch in 1.2 cubic feet
No need to sacrifice cooking power to save some space in the kitchen
Features 10 programmable one-touch controls and both a programmable and 1-pound defrost option
Can be customized to fit the specific needs of virtually any user
cons: This model tends to be louder than most models when in use

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Use - No Prints!
customer_reviews.text: This model has very easy to use and convenient control features. 90% of the time, we push one button to start the microwave. we really like that the finish does not show fingerprints like our previous stainless steel microwave did. The unit is powerful enough to be reasonably fast, yet space saving size and tall enough inside for anything we want to use it for. The only negative so far is the custom defrost cycles are way too aggressive, actually starting cooking both beef and chicken about 1/2 way through the recommended time - not good. If I enter about 50% of the actual weight of the item, the recommended time is about right. Very good value at $110.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Door handle gets the deal
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective. I love the door handle as apposed to the press button other brands have to open the door - it works a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Pieter Lombard

customer_reviews.title: Good microwave
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave as it should be for this price lol. No problems at all. It's powerful and spacious.i can put a full size bag of microwavable popcorn in there and it will not touch the sides while spinning on the plate.
customer_reviews.author: Danyelle Thomas

customer_reviews.title: A microwave you should not pass up!  Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The size is great. Noise is a lot less than my last one. The controls are really convenient for quick cooking. A button for melting or softening button to 1 lbs. button for defrosting. The front is anti smudge. It came quick. I did buy on sale, but it was worth the money. It is quiet, convenient buttons, hardly any cleaning, and looks great. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Marta M. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: GREAT microwave for an apartment..Not too big,but good on strength/heating.. & it's Easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: TerriT.13

customer_reviews.title: Keep the box it comes in.
customer_reviews.text: Got a bad one. I want to return it, but the box has been thrown out, so I'm screwed and angry. The interior light flickers, and the 1100 watt power is definitely less than our old 1000 watt microwave. The popcorn setting won't pop popcorn properly. If you buy one of these, keep the box it comes in.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: I am not a happy person. Will never order anything like this from ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one and it was defective. Got the replacement and it was defective, also. After going to all the trouble of unpacking and setting both of these up and finding that neither works, I am not a happy person. Will never order anything like this from Amazon again. I should have bought it at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Sun Worshiper

customer_reviews.title: ... had a buzzer that wasn't too loud (3) was nice looking (4) the light came on when the door ...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a microwave that (1) was quiet (2) had a buzzer that wasn't too loud (3) was nice looking (4) the light came on when the door was opened and (5) didn't cost a fortune. This one fit the bill and for the most part, I'm satisfied with it. The only problem is it takes quite a bit longer to cook the food than my old one did. It's not worth the hassle of returning it so I guess I'll just have to get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Toni R. Banks

customer_reviews.title: Extremely noisy and sounds like the parts are banging around!!
customer_reviews.text: This Microwave is TERRIBLE and I have contacted Toshiba about it right after I got it. So far, it works ok but it makes loud banging noise when using it. It sounds like tennis shoes banging around in a dryer and lately it is now shorting out so I have to unplug it and then replug it back in for it to start again. I really wanted to have it replaced but they thought I should only do that if it stopped working completely. Not happy with this purchase at ALL!!!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: I hoped it would last at least ONE year!
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, I bought this on 12/13/2018. It's now 12/5/2019 and I just brought in a replacement microwave from my doorstep. The plastic coating started peeling off the numbers in a matter of months. A week ago, it started to making an awful racket and we believe it's the turntable. Anyway, pathetic. The real shame is that it's yet another thing that will end up in our landfills.
customer_reviews.author: SnowKnitty

customer_reviews.title: Works well but light constantly goes out
customer_reviews.text: Although this is the first microwave I've ever had that warms the bowls/plates/mugs more than their contents, it works well enough otherwise. The only significant complaint I have is that whenever something gets the interior hot (like heating up soup) the LED interior light stops working for a few hours. I've contacted Toshiba customer service about this but they never responded. Update: as of 11-25-18 the light has completely stopped working. The uneven heating has continued and usually makes no sense at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ian W

customer_reviews.title: Worthless after one year
customer_reviews.text: We bought this microwave when we moved to a new house a little over a year ago. It worked great! Then a couple of days ago the interior light went out. It still works, but you can't see what's going on while cooking anymore. I called Toshiba about a replacement light and was informed that no replacement light was available and that I would have to buy a new microwave. It was so inexpensive to begin with I should have known it wouldn't last.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Microwave stopped working on day 39
customer_reviews.text: Microwave stopped heating anything 9 days after Amazon one month return window. I spent a long time chatting with product support, trying different solutions, including him wanting me to take the cabinet off. He said there is a one year warranty; however, I would need to ship it back for repair. I think that is unreasonable. I believe Amazon or Toshiba should appreciate their customers and have ups pick up this one and bring a new one the same day.
customer_reviews.author: kgwg

customer_reviews.title: Junk.  Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is a little piece of junk. I purchased it in April 2019 and am already replacing it. Sometimes it works and sometimes it doesn’t. Sometimes the light inside comes on and sometimes it doesn’t. Now the light inside flashes every time I program a cook time.
customer_reviews.author: P. J.

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioned out of the box
customer_reviews.text: The second or third time we used it, it malfunctioned and continued to do so. When the cook time was up, the buzzer went off and just kept going off while the oven continued to stay on. I had to open the door to get it to stop. The second time, opening the door didn't even stop it! Toshiba promptly refunded my money, and now i'm stuck with the defective product. It was nice looking, and very quiet though.
customer_reviews.author: Becki

customer_reviews.title: Very quite
customer_reviews.text: I really like this microwave so far just after a few weeks of use. It looks nice and best thing is how quite it is... Only items I have issue with is fact that only front is stainless (which I think is similar case for other microwaves) & some of the controls take getting used to. Otherwise very good.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Alright while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Well, it cooked stuff, as microwaves are wont to do. CONS: About 4 days before the return period is over (and thankfully not any later), it began making a sound like a huge, rusty gate being opened shortly after being started. Seems the motor that spins the platter inside just couldn't take it anymore and started to give up, evidenced by removing the platter entirely and running it resulting in much softer or no motor screeching sound. This, in combination with the subsequent smoky smell that came from the rear vents, led to an immediate return. Gonna find a microwave that's hopefully less prone to roaring like Godzilla.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Potrzeba

customer_reviews.title: Bugs galore: don't buy this
customer_reviews.text: Only had this in use for one month and already the light is broken, flashing and blinking like a manic strobe. Then the power will not "reset" back to full power (level 10) no matter what you try. (yes I did the cook time function first, and then the power level "10" but once I push start, the power reverts back to 8. I made a mistake--hope to save you from making one too.
customer_reviews.author: Anastasia McL

customer_reviews.title: Stainless Steel vs BLACK Stainless Steel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Stainless Steel version unaware that they are referring ONLY to the front bezel/face of the microwave. The top and sides are still black. The description they use is "Stainless Steel finish" vs "Black Stainless Steel exterior" for the two models which is kind of confusing and somewhat misleading. If this was an over the range type that is installed in a cabinet it obviously would not be an issue but, this is a countertop model. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Makes horrible loud vibrating noise
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for the first few weeks....and then, suddenly one day, it began making an extremely loud vibration noise within 5 seconds of operation on ANY setting. It still, however, works. I need to contact the manufacturer, but if it wasn't for that noise, I'd give it a high rating
customer_reviews.author: NY Mews

customer_reviews.title: New microwave
customer_reviews.text: The first new microwave I have had in 20 years! I like the fact it has a handle rather than a push button to get in. I am having some trouble getting used to the fact I cannot put in the time manually. I would like to be able to put in 1 minute 15 seconds but it only comes in 30 intervals. Also, it was slated as very quiet. That has not been our experience. Unless you place your item very carefully in the exact middle of the glass plate, it makes noises as it turns. However, cooking wise all seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: A MODERN MACHINE WITH TOSHIBA QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I just threw out my last microwave after an astounding 40-year run! I kid you not. In 1979, it was a top end SAMSUNG I bought from a neighbor who no longer needed it. But to the product at hand, I chose this Toshiba model for it's brand recognition and quality. The 1100 watts gives me plenty of power to play with. In fact, surprising power! Toshiba's 1100 watts of today exceeds in performance, in my opinion, the 1500 watt rating of my old unit. It's scary effective, and apparently a best seller. Instructions for use are a tiny bit complicated, though well documented. And only Four Stars for the clunky, bang-shut door when closing.
customer_reviews.author: wrdplayy

customer_reviews.title: seems like due to high temprature
customer_reviews.text: The interior light will start blinking after being used over 5 minutes, seems like due to high temprature? Otherwise this oven works good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Purplexsu

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to operate purchased in may-now august and there is condensation between the two pieces of glass. 60 day warranty is up.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen R. Wentworth

customer_reviews.title: this the best I ever had
customer_reviews.text: yes ..this the best I ever had .. small beep.. in no case u have company..cooking levels great
customer_reviews.author: tina marden

customer_reviews.title: Food cold after 5 minutes in the middle.
customer_reviews.text: November 27th 2019 this is the worst microwave ever. I am pissed off that I threw the Box away. Do not buy this microwave. It takes forever to heat and if food doesn't stay hot it gets cold very quick. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: penny sanders

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC AND BEST PRICE EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS MICROWAVE DESERVES A "10 STAR RATING" AS FAR AS I AM CONCERNED!! IT IS COMPACT, FITS GREAT ON MY COUNTER. IT IS EASY TO USE, HAS EVERY LEVEL AND POWER YOU WOULD EVER NEED AND IT IS SO QUIET I BARELY HEAR IT, EVEN IN THE KITCHEN NEARBY!! I WOULD ABSOLUTELY RECOMMEND THIS TOSHIBA OVEN UNCONDITIONALLY. AND, IF YOU LOOK, YOU WILL SEE THAT I HARDLY EVER POST REVIEWS!! BUT, I AM A REAL 79 YEAR OLD LADY IN TEXAS AND THIS REVIEW IS REAL!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane F

customer_reviews.title: good Microwave
customer_reviews.text: When our 25 year old microwave "gave-up-the ghost" I spent quite a bit of time looking at units, reading reviews and finally coming to a decision of purchasing this Toshiba microwave......like a lot of people we use our microwave a ton, really a lot of usage, so we wanted a reliable unit that could perform all of the varied functions, yet could be used with "pushing one button" when one didn't want to mess with complicated programing...well, this unit does both..multiple functions yet when wanted (usually by me and not my wife :-) ) could be used simply. Everything works well as advertised...excellent instructions were included.....highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: doesnt work after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave in Nov and now it doesnt work only after 2mos of having it
customer_reviews.author: Charrisme

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly so far. Will update if something comes up.
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Maab Ali

customer_reviews.title: DEFECTIVE PRODUCT - Amazon should NOT sell!
customer_reviews.text: POWER LEVEL randomly drops from default of 100% power, to a lower power level while cooking, producing uncooked food. Amazon is aware of the defect and should not be selling this unit! Resetting the power level does not fix the problem. The only way to temporarily solve the issue is to unplug the unit, which resets the software. Sad that the defect ruins such a fine looking unit.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Appraisal

customer_reviews.title: The microwave function works just fine, however
customer_reviews.text: The LED interior light sometimes does not light up. The microwave function works just fine, however. I do not like that I have to press 'cook time' before typing in how long I like to cook, as our last two microwaves you simply type in the duration and press Go.
customer_reviews.author: Jgizzy

customer_reviews.title: Defective Product
customer_reviews.text: We loved it until it started having strange issues: (1) plastic control panel bubbled; (2) I prefer to cook at lower than full power level because you can heat without really cooking but sometimes it simply won't turn off without being unplugged! (3) other times it simply doesn't work--have to unplug, then replug, then it works. This can be tricky since it's on a shelf above the counter. Called in on my warranty because all happened when only about 6 months old. They sent a refund check rather than a replacement. Still using with periodic issues. I would not recommend this oven.
customer_reviews.author: NM Marj

customer_reviews.title: Would  I buy again? Yes!
customer_reviews.text: Everytime I buy something its on sale the next day. bought this microwave for 118 It's on sale omg. Anyway great microwave love it. There is this strong smell like plastic when opening. In 2 minutes it was boiling water love it.
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is a piece of junk. The light bulb burnt out inside it in less than a year. It is also making a weird noise when the tray rotated inside when you have it on and is now not heating our food very well. Needless to say I wish I could return this to get my money back because it is not a good quality item at all.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Frey

customer_reviews.title: Very quiet, can disable the chimes
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through many microwave ovens in 10 years. Most are too noisy, especially the chimes which rarely can be disabled. The door opens and closes quietly (doesn't use the usual noisy push button to open). Push the "8" button for several seconds until it beeps to turn off the beeper. Do the same to turn it back on. This 1100W unit cooks evenly, unlike my former 1200W Panasonic Inverter model.
customer_reviews.author: Retired vet in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Works well; has one significant flaw.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave has worked well over the months we have had it. It seems to have slightly less power than our previous one and takes a little longer to cook, however, that was easy to adjust to. Unfortunately, from the first use, the interior light flickered continually and then would go out about a minute into cooking and stay off. It also rarely worked when the door was opened. As time went on, the functioning of the light got progressively worse until now it rarely lights-up at all, and even then gives just a quick annoying flicker. The lighting unit is not accessible for repair or replacement or even to check if something is merely loose.
customer_reviews.author: William J. McLoughlin

customer_reviews.title: Well Thought Out
customer_reviews.text: This could be the perfect microwave oven. Numbers are easy to see unlike most microwaves. The add 30 seconds is backgrounded in yellow and the stop in red at the bottom. So easy to spot. 1-6 buttons are auto actuated. Runs super quite. Wasn't sure it was working. Cooks nice and even. All kinds of special microwave settings. Five rings when food is done. I like the large handle for opening and closing. Small footprint. Large enough for almost anything you might want to microwave. Stainless steel looks great on the counter. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Stephan J.

customer_reviews.title: Stoped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this microwave in Oct/18. Today July 23/2018 it stopped working. Its not heating anything. Please save your money and buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Rohit Lall

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: My old microwave died after 9 years. This has all the new features. I got this in black, the size is perfect and the price is just right. It has a light inside, easy to use. I love this and Amazon got this to me in 2 days. I don't need any extra features. Just love this.
customer_reviews.author: Judi Faye

customer_reviews.title: Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: The microwave replaces an older less powerful model It is 1100 watts and cooks very fast and is great for microwave popcorn.
customer_reviews.author: Concerned citizen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Baking Potatoes, and Intuitive Functionality
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research for this, and chose the Toshiba EM131A5C-SS for its simplicity, relative price, and good reviews. I really like the front handle and the intuitiveness of functions most of all. I can do a quick start in :30 increments or a customized time, and the pre-set for potatoes is perfect for a small-to-medium sized Idaho potato. I had to add a little more for a big potato, but it came out very evenly-cooked. No tough or black ends. Potatoes and reheating is my #1 use of a microwave. It's even easy to set the clock and start or mute the touchpad beeping. So far, very good!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Schwartzberg

customer_reviews.title: Two defective units in one week.
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy. The first one I ordered arrived visibly damaged with dent and a gap between door unit and main unit. Key pad would not work and unit would not turn off. Asked for replacement. Second unit arrived unscathed but keypad would not work again and it turned on when you closed the door. Upon closer inspection I saw that this too had the same gap between the door unit and main microwave. This is a manufacturing problem. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: ponageman

customer_reviews.title: This is a pile of scrap.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived totally trashed. Big dent in the bottom, wouldn't even sit level. The door was hanging, big dent in the top and one side. I didn't dare even plug it in. I returned it for a full refund. What a disaster.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and tough.  Pretty too!
customer_reviews.text: I really have enjoyed using this microwave oven. My favorite feature is that you can turn off the beeping sound. I have had this oven for around three months and I have had no problems. We even moved and nothing broke so pretty durable. The light still works on mine even after the move so I am not sure why there are so many complaints about them breaking right away. I highly recommend this microwave oven.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Warren

customer_reviews.title: What the heck?!
customer_reviews.text: I recognize I chose the Warehouse option... but it was supposed to be in very good condition. The Toshiba box was literally shredded and had MANY holes cut in it. The styrofoam was in tiny fragments and pellets. Upon removing the microwave from the box, I noted a couple very minor dents on the top, and the plastic frame was pulled away from the door. I have NO CLUE how that could happen. I also didn’t see a way to fix it, other than have the door replaced. The $18 discount, for a very broken microwave, was definitely not worth it. Obvious return. I don’t know who inspected this at the “Warehouse,” but they did a terrible job!
customer_reviews.author: Atira

customer_reviews.title: Like it better than I thought I would
customer_reviews.text: I did some homework comparing microwaves. This microwave is smaller than my 35yr old Panasonic that finally bite the dust so I wasn't sure if I'd like it. I was totally surprised... bigger isn't always better! The turntable is the same size, its just not as tall inside but still, everything fits inside. Its much easier to operate... just have to change old habits. Looks great on my cart or my counter. Makes a little noise but not bothersome. Best bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Janis S

customer_reviews.title: toshiba not of high quality
customer_reviews.text: I can see this particular microwave heading for the garbage prematurely. Functions nice however beep feature needs to stop when opened. Can`t shut off cuz I`m not the only user(3 others in household). What bothers me the most is I received just before Christmas (Dec 22 ish) and the buttons for off and 30 sec are already cracked(Jan. 5th). Its only had real light use as a coffee in am and accassionally to reheat leftovers for lunch. It seems to me to be of low quality. My old GE lasted 20 yrs without any problems whatsoever. I can see a new GE in the near future. Very disappointed with this purchase especially after reading all the good write ups
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Great Microwave
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is such an upgrade from our last. Nicely priced with all the cool new options. Even the light is like blue LED. Really easy to use. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dagon

customer_reviews.title: Two microwaves sent out, both had major issues.
customer_reviews.text: First microwave sent to me: With my hand holding the door opened, I had a little weight to it, the microwave kicked on! Notice this by accident. Then I duplicated it every time I push the door down, with barely any force and it would turn on. The second one that came in, the microwave turned on as soon as I plugged it in, without touching anything. Pushing the buttons didn't turn it off. That was enough, returned and bought something else.
customer_reviews.author: sam smith

customer_reviews.title: Walmart models are probably better...
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could still return this. Biggest frustration is you can't heat anything while using the kitchen timer feature. I need to time other food while heating or melting stuff in the microwave. You have to clear your timer before you can heat anything... this is 2019... my microwave from 2010 did this! There is a lag when touching the button and the microwave registering the button pushed. Steam gets inside the door. Very poor quality, it says 1000 watts, but does not heat like my last microwave did. Wish I would have bought a different one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Poor in many ways
customer_reviews.text: I checked out reviews and this Toshiba rated very well. When I got this one it heated poorly and unevenly. Required higher settings and more time for the same heating jobs as my other microwaves. Defrosting very uneven. After a couple of weeks it started screeching. The good reviews are a mystery to me. I will try to find another brand since I am not willing to try another Toshiba.
customer_reviews.author: JHK

customer_reviews.title: This was a recommended buy on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: We will be returning this microwave due to interior light not working and low power wattage after only owning for 2 months. It was a poor choice of microwave. We chose this product because Amazon had recommended it as the Best Buy !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice microwave, very loud
customer_reviews.text: We received this last week and it looks extremely sleek and works very well. The things I don’t like about it; - the location of the time cook button is extremely annoying. Very easy to forget to push - VERY LOUD ; the only option is to turn the volume off , if I knew how loud it was and no volume control i would have ordered a different one Otherwise it’s a nice microwave
customer_reviews.author: Todd Yolish

customer_reviews.title: Why the two stars? Because it was smoking hot.
customer_reviews.text: This worked for about a month. Then while reheating a bowl of rice for 2 minutes, I smelled something terrible: burning plastic. I opened the door and the chamber a plume of white smoke came out. I tried another reheat on some soup with the same result. It's going back. What I loved about it: 1. Silent mode: you can turn off the beeping sounds on the buttons and the cooking completion. 2. The 30 second button. 3. The three custom settings. 4. The quiet operation. But those aren't enough when something inside the works of the device are clearly over-heating.
customer_reviews.author: Northwesterner

customer_reviews.title: on replacement oven , we called customer service
customer_reviews.text: Well the product flaw which was cook power level was not working..... actually does work, but you have to know what to do, cause manual does not give correct info. If you want to use power level, you must enter the "cook time" instead of power level. so instead of quick time or power level....first enter a cook time, then hit power level and choose the power level you desire. And rep did not immediately understand what were trying to discuss.
customer_reviews.author: grammyfierce

customer_reviews.title: It Just Arrived, So...
customer_reviews.text: ...I can't really say anything about performance yet. But it arrived with a big honking dent on the top edge on the side near controls. While I plan on keeping it (I don't have the strength to haul it up and down stairs and I can't be certain that one of my condo neighbors will be around to help) anyway and in general, I am not about appearance, I would suggest taking a look at a product before shipping it out in that state. I tested it on a cup of tea and it certainly heats quickly and evenly, so I think we are all good. Just...check for dents next time, okay????
customer_reviews.author: Yarnspinner

customer_reviews.title: Worked for 8 months
customer_reviews.text: Our last microwave lasted over 15 years. Still worked but the wheels had dug a rut into the bottom and it didn't seem safe. This one seemed good and was for the first 8 months. Then it started making noises that I cannot identify. And it does not heat as well as it used to. Gremlins are running amok in it I am afraid. So I guess I need to contact Toshiba. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Biggs

customer_reviews.title: What a nice Microwave
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is Wow! This thing is nice. It looks awesome and works excellent. I love the color scheme and functionality. It's easy to use. I am in aw at how nice it looks sitting on a counter. If you are looking for a counter top replacement microwave this is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Buddy

customer_reviews.title: electronic Problems right away
customer_reviews.text: This is my second posting...I generally like the machine BUT it always goes blank with a continuous beep and the clock goes blank whenever you try to get it to start . It finally stops beeping and with clock at 0:00 you can hit the appropriate keys and it will work just fine. This seems like some type of electronics problem. I notified Toshiba back in June (when new) but no feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not of great quality
customer_reviews.text: For nearly 5 months the microwave has performed as expected. Now, however, things have changed. Whenever something is heated/cooked that steams, the steams collects on the inside of the door window and runs. A seal or something of the sort must have given way. I took this problem to Toshiba service and was told that this is normal and should try to contain the steam via better cookware. Very disappointed in Toshiba.
customer_reviews.author: Alfie E.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for about 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: Then the connector for one of the thermostats went kaput and burnt up. Haven't figured out how to fix it exactly (the piece is easy enough to find, but that mounting screw isn't budging and I can't find the exact wire/connector I need for it), but when I e-mailed them for support I got no response. Either way, these things happen, buy the warranty - because you are likely on your own. And realistically this started at about 10 months (wire burning smell a few times), but just finished its run a week ago. I'm pretty dumb when it comes to electronics, so if anyone knows the exact wire/receptacle to use to connect two thermostats, do tell haha.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Nice microwave
customer_reviews.text: Nice overall microwave, cooks quick with being 1100 watts, Only four stars because I moved into new apartment and there is a spot for mic. in cabinet but the back of cord hits wall and plug sticks to far out when in the outlet. would be nice if the plug was a flush mount plug and the cord coming out back was parallel with back of mic. and it would fit perfect. They did provide shelf extension but still makes the front of the mic. tippy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality/Lots of Glitches
customer_reviews.text: Microwave arrived well packaged with no damage to the shipping or inner boxes, but the door turned out to be crooked and only closes straight sometimes, which leads to the microwave starting up without any buttons being touched when the door isn’t even fully closed or when you go to pull it open. The microwave also sporadically resets to default and “blacks out” when opening and closing the door (screen goes black and, when it comes back on, the clock is reset to 00:00, the sound is turned back on and the settings are back to default).
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid microwave oven
customer_reviews.text: This microwave oven has worked great so far. Cooking times are consistent and it's easy to use, although if you're someone who likes to be very specific with your timing settings, i.e. 2:17, then you need to realize that unlike many other ovens you have to go through a couple of steps to do this because hitting any of the numbered buttons starts the oven instantly for that many minutes. So if you started to type the 2:17 above, the microwave is going to turn on as soon as you hit "2" for 2:00 minutes. You have to do 'timed cooking' if you want to be specific, which is a bit annoying since it requires extra steps.
customer_reviews.author: Anton Stocker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent microwave - reviews agree!
customer_reviews.text: I read not only Amazon but other online reviews of microwaves before I bought this one. This machine did make the list in the top on many sites. While it has decent reviews here, I was concerned about complaints about it being hard to use. All I can say is WHAT?? If you have ever owned a microwave, it's easy peasy. I glanced at the owner's manual, after that, it's so simple, I can't understand the fuss. Some suggested they "rewrite the manual" - ok. Whatever, but it's completely unnecessary. It's a one-touch system. So much more powerful than my old machine. I dunno who writes these reviews, guess everyone is different.
customer_reviews.author: L. Short

customer_reviews.title: AS OF APRIL 15M 2020 THE MICROWAVE IS BROKEN
customer_reviews.text: I REALLY LIKE THE MICROWAVE AND AS OF YESTERDAY, WITH NORMAL WEAR AND TEAR OF ONE INDIVIDUAL THE MICROWAVE NO LONGER IS WORKING. IT NO LONGER COOKS ANYTHING. WHAT DO I DO? IT IS LESS THANK FOUR MONTH OLD. ARE YOU GOING TO ISSUE ME ANOTHER ONE AND I WILL RETERN THE DEAD ONE?
customer_reviews.author: GABY

customer_reviews.title: Bright light
customer_reviews.text: It works great, the light is brighter than any other microwave I've ever owned. The reason I decided on this model was that one answered question stated that you can run the timer while cooking. This is absolutely not true. 5 stares if it did.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Novak

customer_reviews.title: I should have replaced my old microwave ages ago
customer_reviews.text: We bought this because our old microwave was making crazy noises, wouldn't keep time on it's clock and we were afraid it would die and leave us with nothing in the middle of the pandemic. Toshiba is a good brand so we went with it and now I wish we'd done it a year ago. It's quiet, seems to have more power than our old one though the specs are the same and it has one touch time, so I don't have to spend extra time punching numbers in. My only disappointment was in the incredibly long wait for it to ship, but it was during the time Amazon wasn't shipping "non-essentials" so I couldn't be too upset about it.
customer_reviews.author: Always Happy

customer_reviews.title: Defrost is worthless
customer_reviews.text: The defrost on this oven is absolutely worthless. You might as well just turn it on to the regular heat and wait to pull it out. If you use any of their defrost settings, you'll totally destroy whatever it is you're trying defrost. Do you want to soften a frozen cube of butter? Hahahahaha. Use their recommended settings and your butter will be a puddle before you know it. This oven is way too powerful. It takes 30 seconds heat a cold cup of coffee to 3000 degrees celsius. Our 40-year-old microwave is a thousand times better. You can actually defrost something with cremating it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Gets stuck at power level 8
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this microwave! I am a software engineer, and I'm telling you this microwave has a firmware problem. Sometimes, after a defrosting, then programming normal cooking, the power level will get stuck at 8 as the default. You can program cook times, and power levels of 1 - 9, but you can never get the power level back to 10. If I unplug the microwave, then it finally resets and defaults to full power (PL-10).
customer_reviews.author: Ron Kropp

customer_reviews.title: Clock doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Microwave was great out of the box, a huge improvement over our last microwave. However, periodically it does not heat correctly--not all the time, maybe 10% of the time, it is like the power is not working, though it looks like everything is fine, but the food will be ice cold. The other problem is that the clock consistently runs fast, so that the clock is hours ahead. Again, it was fine out of the box, but after about a month of use, it is not working correctly. Think twice about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jmcnulty

customer_reviews.title: Interior Light Burned Out on Third Use
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a decent unit - and on the first couple of uses it was intuitive and nice. But the interior light burned out on the 3rd use and there's no way to replace the bulb. Returned it, will probably buy a different brand now.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Pattison

customer_reviews.title: Yes.  The beeper can be turned off.  I love it.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is slightly different than the other one, but the beeping was the worst! But it cooks better and I have had no problems except for the directions on the turning off of the beeper. They're a bit confusing, but I held the #8 button down until the long beep and it worked just fine. To turn it back on is the same procedure I guess. Anyway we've had it for a little while and I'm completely satisfied. I can't rate the features - it is too early to determine because I haven't used it except for simple items so far.
customer_reviews.author: Asian at Heart

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how quiet it is. Love the feature that you can remove the beeps and have it quiet when it's done. It does the job and heats my food and heats up a cup of tea and cooks my frozen meatballs. Love the stainless steel finish and so far it washs up nice. Fits nicely in a built in shelf within my kitchen cabinets. Not to big and not to small. I've had every size and realized this is the only size you need.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Nic
customer_reviews.text: Item looks very nice. I love the stainless steel and black combo. Good size and wattage for the price range. The Amazon shipping however is TERRIBLE. I waited over 3 WEEKS for it to finally arrive DAMAGED. I'd love to find a replacement elsewhere, but for now I get to lug this heavy thing back to the post office....
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Problem with turntable
customer_reviews.text: Had the unit just about a month and the turntable started to make a loud noise and was not turning evenly. It would turn then stop and turn then stop. Called Toshiba and they are refunding me. Listen to the reviews, I should have, not a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Marty V.

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba EM131A5C-SS Microwave Oven with Smart Sensor
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. Use it about once a day. Noisier than my previous microwave, however, has been working well. ADDITIONAL NOTE: 8/9/2019 - BUYERS BEWARE- almost one year after purchasing suddenly the turntable mechanism is making scraping and loud noises. Its is quite annoying and should NOT be happening on a product less than 1 year old and used about 5-7 times per week to heat up a meal. Disappointing to say the least.
customer_reviews.author: Mike E.

customer_reviews.title: Depth listed includes the handle.
customer_reviews.text: We almost didn’t order this because of the dimensions listed. They are correct but the depth includes the handle. We didn’t think it would fit in our microwave cupboard. So the front “feet” are about 12 inches from the back and our cupboard is 16 inches deep. It fits nicely with air space in the back. Haven’t used it much but it seems nice and the price was good.
customer_reviews.author: SLK

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: just received today, does not work correctly. Noise like a car with a bad transmission. poor quality control. poor quality.returning and buying somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: don thompson

customer_reviews.title: Size & Performance are the key words here
customer_reviews.text: The size & perofmance are great. A little disappointed as I believe thought when it is described I bing stainless steel entirely. It 's door is the only stainless, the rest of the cabinet is black steel. The Haier brand is stainless on the inside as well. Don't know how tghey do it to prevent sparks but take whatever I can get.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Weglarz

customer_reviews.title: Touch pad "delaminates"
customer_reviews.text: It would be a 4 1/2 star if the touch pad didn't start disintegrating. I've gotten 2x now. 1st one got "blisters" on the start and stop buttons within days, 2nd did too, but also had the added bonus of having a bent bottom, so the turntable did not sit level. The first was double boxed, the second wasn't. The box was beaten like someone didn't like it, and the unit was probably a return. I went with an LG
customer_reviews.author: JHE

customer_reviews.title: OOPS
customer_reviews.text: I live in a HOME where meals are served. When I received the microwave, I put water in it to make sure it works. I did not use it until a couple of days ago when I warmed up left over chicken bits from the refrigerator for my dog. The microwave started to spark around the food and a small flame evolved by the food. When I opened it up a lot of smoke came out. A couple of days ago I tried it again. I warmed up some ham bits from the refrigerator when basically the same thing happened flames and all. I am returning the microwave for these reasons.
customer_reviews.author: DeeDeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Received defective unit
customer_reviews.text: Removed from box, plugged it in and it started running. No way to stop unit except to open the door. Called Toshiba and they immediately referred me to Amazon. Claimed they were aware of the manufacturing defect. Customer service at Amazon immediately addressed the issue and processed the return with UPS. It was picked up the following day and a complete refund was applied to my account 1 day later. Don't want to take a chance with a replacement. Trying another brand. Unfortunate experience, very inconvenient but Amazon is very easy to work with. Toshiba needs to up their game as far as quality control goes before shipping out these units.
customer_reviews.author: Maggi Malone

customer_reviews.title: I liked this microwave until the glass door exploded.
customer_reviews.text: I've had the microwave for almost two years and really liked it. That is, until the glass in the microwave door exploded. I opened the door to heat some food. The door hit the glass cover, which was on the plate. Nothing happened to the cover. It didn't even chip. On the other hand, the microwave door exploded. Glass from the microwave was everywhere. Thankfully no one was hurt. I am so glad I was the only one in the kitchen. I've never heard of a door exploding. This is not a safe product, especially in a household with children.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Catastrophic failure in less than 2 years of normal use
customer_reviews.text: We are amazed that in less than 2 years of normal use the oven suffered catastrophic failure for no apparent reason. We were unable to reach anyone from Toshiba or Amazon that could offer a solution. We're in need of replacement now, very disappointing. I Spoke with Manual, customer service manager at Media the parent company for Microwave products for Toshiba who stonewalled me with no offer of resolution. So! buyer beware Toshiba isn't what we thought it was when quality and standing behind their product is concerned. Pathetic.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney J.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: My microwave gave out during the early part of our shut-down and I couldn't go out to purchase a new microwave unit. I found this one and it had good reviews so I purchased it. All the reviews I read are true, the unit is small, which I need, easy to use and very quiet. One of the most important items was that the buttons were in a similar pattern to my old microwave. They are and work very easily. Another plus is that it was delivered to my house so I didn't have to worry about trying to move a heavy unit out of a store and into my house.
customer_reviews.author: TSK

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microware in June, stopped working in Feb. Broke in less than a year. I dont use the microwave often, maybe 2 -3 times a week and one day it just stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: M. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good features, questionable engineering.
customer_reviews.text: I liked this microwave at first, but I'm questioning its quality now. Its quiet and nice looking, but when I started cleaning it, I discovered a flaw that makes it much less safe. If you lift up on the door, it triggers a relay that starts the microwave. It doesn't start while opened but grabbing the handle or the base of the door both start the microwave. A hair trigger relay should not be so close to a moving object. The rest of its good so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Turntable glass cracked
customer_reviews.text: Turntable glass cracked within few months and I am contacting amazon and Toshiba but didn't get the glass replaced.Have used so many microwave and I never had this cracking issue before.Defintetly would not recommend this
customer_reviews.author: TanCk

customer_reviews.title: Toshiba Microwave
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during self quarantine because our 18 year old GE hood microwave decided to die. We felt this micro would be a good option for us under the current situation. Now a little after a week it started smoking and completely stopped working. Sending it back now is not an option. All the reviews seemed good must just got a lemon .
customer_reviews.author: Peter L Keeler

customer_reviews.title: Good unit but has minor issues
customer_reviews.text: Well working microwave, but the final fitment & finish are a bit off, with the most obvious problem being the misalignment of the door. The door is misaligned about 1/8th inch, but this doesn't seems to affect the function of the microwave.
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Not a great model
customer_reviews.text: The power button doesn't work and it makes weird noises when it's running. I didn't really read the reviews before I bought it thinking Toshiba couldn't possibly go wrong with a microwave. I was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Sweeney Mae

customer_reviews.title: Love it so long as there's no strobe light
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Toshiba in ~18 months. I liked the last one (900w) until the interior light went wacko like a strobe light. Too late for warranty and local repair places charge an arm and leg to even look at it. Despite reviews that this 1100w has the same problem, I went ahead and ordered it June 3, '20 because it looks good and I do like the controls. So, I'm just hoping that if the strobe light comes back, it'll do so before the warranty expires. That's why I gave 4 stars instead of 5; not so sure I trust this thing yet.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Green

customer_reviews.title: Nice alll around.
customer_reviews.text: Love this microwave. Doesn’t take up a ton of counter space, handle makes it easy to open, nice 30 second fast button. I don’t use a ton of features but the ones I have used I liked. The interior light is really nice to have on when you open the door as well as when the food is being cooked.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Failed after about 30 uses
customer_reviews.text: I understand the concept of burn-in, so early failures of electronic equipment is not uncommon. The interior light sputtered and flickered, but last week--maybe 30 uses total--a loud bang and burning smell and the microwave doesn't produce microwaves anymore. No heating what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy tousbia
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry this is not four star item turn table made sounds when moving it’s only two weeks old don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Laura Harris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect microwave for me!
customer_reviews.text: I'm writing because I almost did not buy this one because two prior reviewers complained that their new microwaves had failed so soon and unexpectedly. Reading the excellent instruction booklet I see that there is a way to press the 'Stop button' that renders the microwave inoperable so children can't use it. Mine works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Simple soul

customer_reviews.title: I like my Toshiba for the most part.
customer_reviews.text: Quick heat-ups are great..haven't used anything else yet. The APPLIANCE CORD should be at least 4-5 inches LONGER to reach base-board wall outlets. Everyone doesn't have a contemporary, state-of-the-art kitchen! I'd hoped to place the microwave on TOP of the counter, not on the middle section..inconvenient having to stoop to use it esp. those of us with less than perfect backs! My growing concern is learning the number of CONTROLS in the manual..I feel like I'm studying for an exam LOL But, if I'm gonna use the features, I'll learn them ALL! Still pleased that I bought it..so far. Btw. I have NO complaints about the 5 beeps when heating's done. Good product.. just needs longer cord. Thanx Ms. MS
customer_reviews.author: Maxine R.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Function, Right Out of the Box
customer_reviews.text: I should have known this was a lemon when the interior light lit up as soon as it was plugged in. The "Start" button doesn't work. Lots of bells and whistles to input, but, on every single attempt, the start button does not engage the oven. Wonder if I will end up a satisfied customer. I doubt it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Brooks

product_meta.title: Toshiba EM131A5C-BS Microwave Oven with Smart Sensor, Easy Clean Interior, ECO Mode and Sound On/Off, 1.2 Cu.ft, Black Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: Size:1.2 Cu.ft| Color:Black Stainless SteelThis Toshiba 1. 2 Cubic feet 1100 watt Black Stainless Steel microwave is the ideal size for apartment kitchens or office break rooms. Sensor reheating lets you optimally cook six of the most popular food items with the touch of a button. Choose from ten power levels up to 1100 watts. The large digital display has a clock function and can also display a countdown timer as well as the cooking time remaining. Program up to three favorite time and power combinations for additional one-touch convenience. Easily open or close the microwave with the large, easy-to grip door handle. The Black Stainless Steel exterior looks good in any kitchen. The microwave can be turned on for one to six minutes at 100 percent Power by simply touching the number of minutes you would like to cook. If additional cooking time is needed while the microwave is running, press the start button to add an additional 30 seconds of cooking time.
feature_bullets: Pre-programmed sensor menu for optimum heating of popular foods like pizza, potatoes, veggies and more; Rated Voltage : 120V~ 60Hz
Black Stainless Steel exterior, 20.5 x 17.1 x 12.8 inch (w x d x h), large 1.2 cubic feet capacity, cavity 13.07 x 15 x 9.5 inch (w x d x h), turn table 12.4 inch (diameter)
1100 watts with 10 power settings, clock, and kitchen timer
Large digital display, easy-to-read control panel, glass turntable
One touch start popcorn and two defrost settings - custom or one-pound auto defrost. Turntable diameter: 12. 4 inches
Large digital display, easy-to-read control panel, power saving mode, sound on/off option, glass turntable. Rated input power (microwave): 1550 watt
If you wish to mute the buzzer of the microwave, pleas long press on the button "8" For 3-5 seconds. The buzzer is automatically switched off after a long beep.
The keypad was covered by a protection film during the shipment. Please Peel it off before your first use.
1 year, please keep the packaging for contacting Toshiba after sales service and product returns.
NOTE: Kindly refer to the user manual provided as a PDF manual in the product description section

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars5,472 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
